description: An ancient settlement on the north-west coast of Sicily, some 16 km east of modern Palermo.

names.details: Soluntum is listed as "Solunto" in the BTCGI. "Solunto" is also the current Italian name of the archaeological area. Manni 1981 refers to the nearby promontory of "SÃ²lanto", in the municipality of Santa Flavia.
